name: Get C H O N K
name_original: Get C H O N K
description:
First game ever don't @ me

A game to get that boi chonky

Do you want amazing state of the art gameplay? Too bad! Do you want superb graphics that dazzle the eyes? Keep looking! Do you want to pick up snacks and make a low res cat grow? YOU'RE IN LUCK BUDDY!

Cat will grow as you pick up snacks until he can't grow any longer.
